sentences.en: ‘This is my wife.’ ‘Pleased to meet you.’.
"Professor Theron," he began, "I'm very pleased to see you"
sentences.cn: “西伦教授，”他开口说道，“很高兴见到您。”

sentences.en: Darling Neville, I couldn't be more pleased for you.
sentences.cn: 亲爱的内维尔，我真太为你高兴了。

sentences.en: Drake and his cohorts were not pleased with my appointment.
sentences.cn: 德雷克那一帮人对我的任命很不满。

sentences.en: He pretended to be affronted, but inwardly he was pleased.
sentences.cn: 他假装受到了冒犯，但其实内心很高兴。

sentences.en: He seemed to be pleased by this newly minted vehicle.
sentences.cn: 他似乎很满意这辆新出厂的车。

sentences.en: I am so pleased to make your acquaintance, Mr Tweed.
sentences.cn: 很高兴认识您，特威德先生。

sentences.en: I was not too pleased with the record you sent me.
sentences.cn: 我对你寄给我的唱片不太满意。

sentences.en: I'll be only too pleased to help them out with any queries.
sentences.cn: 我非常乐意为他们答疑解惑。

sentences.en: I'm always pleased to try out a new variety.
sentences.cn: 我一直乐于尝试新产品。

sentences.en: I'm pleased to say that he is now doing well.
sentences.cn: 我很高兴地说，他现在一切都好。

sentences.en: I'm pleased with the way things have been going.
Marianne was none too pleased to find Simon seated beside her.
sentences.cn: 玛丽安娜发现西蒙坐在自己旁边很不高兴。

sentences.en: Mr. Singh said he was pleased with the outcome.
sentences.cn: 辛格先生说他对这一结果感到满意。

sentences.en: She seemed pleased by the compliment.
sentences.cn: 她受了赞扬，显得很高兴。

sentences.en: We were very pleased to hear this encouraging news.
sentences.cn: 听到这个令人鼓舞的消息，我们十分高兴。

sentences.en: We will be pleased to delete the charge from the original invoice.
sentences.cn: 我们决定将这笔费用从原始发票上删去。

sentences.en: Your Dad will be so pleased.
